1.0.1.en: Update app images and readme to pass Homey review

1.0.2.en: Fix search when selecting a device. Invert icon colour in darkmode.. Improve slider usability and add the value to the widget

1.0.3.en: Made the range bars thicker. Added buttons for non setable boolean capabilities.

1.0.4.en: Enabled slider tap to set position. Workaround for slider issue to reset position if finger moved off the slider. Added log to app settings page for debugging.

1.0.5.en: Restyled the controls. Added edit mode to enable hiding of capabilities.
